bifolio: Part of six-panel fold-out containing f102v2
condition: Six-panel fold-out folio. Two text blocks, three rows of plant illustrations with labels. Some labels faded (L9, L16, L25, L29). Transcriber uncertainty marks (!, !!, ?) present on multiple lines.

row_1_plants.description: Heart-shaped leaf, oblong three-lobed leaf, wing-shaped leaf, cube root, short wing-shaped leaf, spatula leaf, oblong many-fingered leaf

row_2_plants.description: Wrapped candy flower, comb-shaped leaf, comb-shaped leaf with claws, pine-like leaves, clubsuit-shaped fingers, round leaf with knob-shaped fingers, cypress-like plant with chestnut tuber

row_3_plants.description: Small root, dark roots, carrot plant, round serrated leaf, faded label

notable_readings.orolaly: Confirmed Latin pharmaceutical term meaning 'orally', found in L37 region (EVA: okeo.r!oly)

validation_status.spatial_correlation: Labels spatially correlated with plant and container illustrations

transcription_method: Direct paleographic reading from manuscript image using 7-layer constraint stack
